greeting: What can Operit Coder do for you?

task.title: Task
task.closeAndStart: Close task and start a new one
task.delete: Delete Task (Shift + Click to skip confirmation)
task.shareWithOrganizationDescription: Only members of your organization can access
task.sharePubliclyDescription: Anyone with the link can access
task.connectToCloudDescription: Sign in to Operit Coder Cloud to share tasks
task.openInCloud: Open task in Roo Code Cloud
task.openInCloudIntro: Keep monitoring or interacting with Roo from anywhere. Scan, click or copy to open.

about: Check out our <DocsLink>documentation</DocsLink> to learn more.
onboarding: What would you like to do?

customizableModes.title: Customizable modes that don't swerve
customizableModes.description: Specialized personas that stay on-task and deliver.

modelAgnostic.title: Bring your own model, no markup or lock-in
modelAgnostic.description: Use your own provider key or even run local inference â€” Roo doesn't charge for it

modeSelector.title: Modes
modeSelector.description: Specialized personas that tailor Operit Coder's behavior.

enhancePromptDescription: The 'Enhance Prompt' button helps improve your prompt by providing additional context, clarification, or rephrasing. Try typing a prompt in here and clicking the button again to see how it works.
dragFiles: hold shift to drag in files
dragFilesImages: hold shift to drag in files/images

errorMessage.400: The provider couldn't process the request as made. Stop the task and try a different approach.
errorMessage.401: Couldn't authenticate with provider. Please check your API key configuration.
errorMessage.402: You seem to have run out of funds/credits in your account. Go to your provider and add more to continue.
errorMessage.403: Unauthorized. Your API key is valid, but the provider refused to complete this request.
errorMessage.429: Too many requests. You're being rate-limited by the provider. Please wait a bit before your next API call.
errorMessage.500: Provider server error. Something is wrong on the provider side, there's nothing wrong with your request.
errorMessage.connection: Connection error. Make sure you have a working internet connection.
errorMessage.unknown: Unknown API error. Please contact Kilo support.

checkpoint.initializingWarning: Still initializing checkpoint... If this takes too long, you can disable checkpoints in <settingsLink>settings</settingsLink> and restart your task.

menu.restoreFilesDescription: Restores your project's files back to a snapshot taken at this point.
menu.restoreFilesAndTaskDescription: Restores your project's files back to a snapshot taken at this point and deletes all messages after this point.

truncation.title: Context Truncated
truncation.description: Older messages were removed from the conversation to stay within the context window limit. This is a fast but less context-preserving approach compared to condensation.

instructions.wantsToFetch: Operit Coder wants to fetch detailed instructions to assist with the current task

fileOperations.wantsToRead: Operit Coder wants to read this file
fileOperations.wantsToReadMultiple: Operit Coder wants to read multiple files
fileOperations.wantsToReadAndXMore: Operit Coder wants to read this file and {{count}} more
fileOperations.wantsToReadOutsideWorkspace: Operit Coder wants to read this file outside of the workspace
fileOperations.wantsToEdit: Operit Coder wants to edit this file
fileOperations.wantsToEditOutsideWorkspace: Operit Coder wants to edit this file outside of the workspace
fileOperations.wantsToEditProtected: Operit Coder wants to edit a protected configuration file
fileOperations.wantsToApplyBatchChanges: Operit Coder wants to apply changes to multiple files
fileOperations.wantsToGenerateImage: Operit Coder wants to generate an image
fileOperations.wantsToGenerateImageOutsideWorkspace: Operit Coder wants to generate an image outside of the workspace
fileOperations.wantsToGenerateImageProtected: Operit Coder wants to generate an image in a protected location
fileOperations.wantsToCreate: Operit Coder wants to create a new file
fileOperations.wantsToInsert: Operit Coder wants to insert content into this file
fileOperations.wantsToInsertWithLineNumber: Operit Coder wants to insert content into this file at line {{lineNumber}}
fileOperations.wantsToInsertAtEnd: Operit Coder wants to append content to the end of this file
fileOperations.wantsToDelete: Operit Coder wants to delete this file
fileOperations.wantsToDeleteDirectory: Operit Coder wants to delete this directory

directoryOperations.wantsToViewTopLevel: Operit Coder wants to view the top level files in this directory
directoryOperations.didViewTopLevel: Operit Coder viewed the top level files in this directory
directoryOperations.wantsToViewTopLevelOutsideWorkspace: Operit Coder wants to view the top level files in this directory (outside workspace)
directoryOperations.didViewTopLevelOutsideWorkspace: Operit Coder viewed the top level files in this directory (outside workspace)
directoryOperations.wantsToViewRecursive: Operit Coder wants to recursively view all files in this directory
directoryOperations.didViewRecursive: Operit Coder recursively viewed all files in this directory
directoryOperations.wantsToViewRecursiveOutsideWorkspace: Operit Coder wants to recursively view all files in this directory (outside workspace)
directoryOperations.didViewRecursiveOutsideWorkspace: Operit Coder recursively viewed all files in this directory (outside workspace)
directoryOperations.wantsToViewDefinitions: Operit Coder wants to view source code definition names used in this directory
directoryOperations.didViewDefinitions: Operit Coder viewed source code definition names used in this directory
directoryOperations.wantsToViewDefinitionsOutsideWorkspace: Operit Coder wants to view source code definition names used in this directory (outside workspace)
directoryOperations.didViewDefinitionsOutsideWorkspace: Operit Coder viewed source code definition names used in this directory (outside workspace)
directoryOperations.wantsToSearch: Operit Coder wants to search this directory for {{regex}}
directoryOperations.didSearch: Operit Coder searched this directory for {{regex}}
directoryOperations.wantsToSearchOutsideWorkspace: Operit Coder wants to search this directory (outside workspace) for {{regex}}
directoryOperations.didSearchOutsideWorkspace: Operit Coder searched this directory (outside workspace) for {{regex}}

codebaseSearch.wantsToSearch: Operit Coder wants to search the codebase for {{query}}
codebaseSearch.wantsToSearchWithPath: Operit Coder wants to search the codebase for {{query}} in {{path}}

mcp.wantsToUseTool: Operit Coder wants to use a tool on the {{serverName}} MCP server
mcp.wantsToAccessResource: Operit Coder wants to access a resource on the {{serverName}} MCP server

modes.wantsToSwitch: Operit Coder wants to switch to {{mode}} mode
modes.wantsToSwitchWithReason: Operit Coder wants to switch to {{mode}} mode because: {{reason}}
modes.didSwitchWithReason: Operit Coder switched to {{mode}} mode because: {{reason}}

subtasks.wantsToCreate: Operit Coder wants to create a new subtask in {{mode}} mode
subtasks.wantsToFinish: Operit Coder wants to finish this subtask
subtasks.defaultResult: Please continue to the next task.
subtasks.completionInstructions: Subtask completed! You can review the results and suggest any corrections or next steps. If everything looks good, confirm to return the result to the parent task.

powershell.issues: It seems like you're having Windows PowerShell issues, please see this

autoApprove.title: Auto-approve
autoApprove.description: Run these actions without asking for permission. Only enable for actions you fully trust.
autoApprove.selectOptionsFirst: Select at least one option below to enable auto-approval

announcement.title: Roo Code {{version}} Released
announcement.support: Please support Roo Code by starring us on <githubLink>GitHub</githubLink>.

stealthModel.feature: <bold>Limited-time FREE stealth model</bold> - Code Supernova: Now upgraded with a <bold>1M token context window</bold>! A versatile agentic coding model that supports image inputs, accessible through Roo Code Cloud.
stealthModel.note: (Note: prompts and completions are logged by the model creator and used to improve the model)
stealthModel.selectModel: Select roo/code-supernova from the Roo Code Cloud provider in Settings to get started.

release.heading: What's New:
release.contextRewind: Improved context condensing now lets you restore the full previous context when rewinding to a checkpoint
release.rooProvider: Roo Code Cloud provider now preserves reasoning content and defaults to native tools for better performance

cloudAgents.heading: New in the Cloud:
cloudAgents.specialized: Introducing <bold>Explainer</bold>, <bold>Planner</bold>, and <bold>Coder</bold> - three specialized cloud agents to enhance your workflows.
cloudAgents.description: The agents work together in the cloud and can be triggered from the web or through Slack.

followUpSuggest.copyToInput: Copy to input (same as shift + click)

systemPromptWarning: WARNING: Custom system prompt override active. This can severely break functionality and cause unpredictable behavior.
profileViolationWarning: The current profile isn't compatible with your organization's settings

shellIntegration.title: Command Execution Warning
shellIntegration.description: Your command is being executed without VSCode terminal shell integration. To suppress this warning you can disable shell integration in the Terminal section of the Operit Coder settings or troubleshoot VSCode terminal integration using the link below.
shellIntegration.troubleshooting: Click here for shell integration documentation.

autoApprovedRequestLimitReached.title: Auto-Approved Request Limit Reached
autoApprovedRequestLimitReached.description: Operit Coder has reached the auto-approved limit of {{count}} API request(s). Would you like to reset the count and proceed with the task?

autoApprovedCostLimitReached.title: Auto-Approved Cost Limit Reached
autoApprovedCostLimitReached.description: Kilo has reached the auto-approved cost limit of ${{count}}. Would you like to reset the cost and proceed with the task?

versionIndicator.ariaLabel: Version {{version}} - Click to view release notes

slashCommands.title: Slash Commands
slashCommands.description: Use built-in slash commands or create custom ones for quick access to frequently used prompts and workflows. <DocsLink>Docs</DocsLink>

deleteDialog.title: Delete Command
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the command "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.

slashCommand.wantsToRun: Operit Coder wants to run a slash command
slashCommand.didRun: Operit Coder ran a slash command

dialog.title: Raw message
dialog.contextSource: Context source: ExtensionState.clineMessages (6 messages before/after by ts)
